DOC.HEADLINE: NUCLEAR WEAPONS PORN
DOC.TEXT: A July 12 article described the use of computers at the Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory " to store and distribute hard-core pornography. " It is unfortunate that many Americans still have not recognized that the work of the nuclear_weapons labs in designing , testing and improving nuclear_weapons is an even more serious form of pornography . What could be more obscene than developing weapons that melt eyeballs , cook flesh and incinerate human_beings -- weapons of mass_murder that place the entire human species in danger of annihilation ? DAVID KRIEGER , President Nuclear Age Peace Foundation Santa Barbara
